scenario.title: Title: Fees Infomations Narrative: As a parent, I would like to find out the cost of going to UL so that I can get my finances in order Acceptance Criteria: Scenario 1: Navigating to course fees page
scenario.step: Given that the a course webpage is displayed
When I click on the course fees tab
Then a webpage detailing the course costs is loaded Scenario 2: Navigating to fees page
Given that the a Scholarships webpage is displayed
When I click on the List Scholarships tab
Then a webpage with details of available scholarships is loaded. Scenario 3: Fees Due
Given that the Student Finance webpage is loaded
Then a student log in page is displayed
